title: Roasted carrots & potatoes with  shallots, nigella & rosemary

ingredients.item: 1kg King Edward Potatoes, peeled and cut into halves, thirds or left whole so all are roughly the same size
4 echalion shallots, cut into wedges (about 4-6 per onion)

instructions.step: Preheat the oven to 200ÂºC, gas mark 6. Boil the potatoes in a large pan of salted water for about 4 minutes. Drain and allow to steam dry.
Put the dripping or oil into a large roasting tin along with the maple syrup, nigella seeds, rosemary, lemon and shallots. Tip in the potatoes, season and mix thoroughly.
Roast for 15 minutes then mix in the carrots and cook for 55 minutes more, stirring once or twice, until golden and coloured at the edges
